Funny how that's a strength that'd be really good in a competitive scene where they DO ward properly, but isn't? She's an assassin and assassins thrive on the chaos of soloq is all.

First,  lots of people ward - just we typically ward mostly for ourselves and not coordinated with the team (i.e.warding our Lane instead of the enemy jungle). Which is why Evelynn ganking via permanent stealth is a little annoying in solo queue. Btw, feel free to check my match history - silver 2 and i upgrade my trinket more often than not and typically place over 20 wards per game as a non-support. 

Second,  as to why it's not super valuable in world's:
Pros are better at warding the enemy jungle,  they can spot her doing a camp and figure out where she'll go to gank next and how long it will take. 

Even without wards,  pros have exceptional knowledge of when a champion will be ready to try a gank. 

Further,  pros use a lot more pink wards than solo queue players do. I'd guess in over 50% of my games I'm the only one with a pink on the map. I doubt I've ever seen more than 3 pinks from my team at once. Meanwhile,  pros regularly have 4 or 5 pinks on the map for each team. When a pink gets destroyed that player replaces it. Pinks give true sight and hence can see eve,  so actually her major strength is a LOT weaker in the pro scene.

You make a lot of good points, and I agree. Solo queue, even its very name, is a very individualized mode of play. Unless you're doing, most efforts are centered around yourself nine times out of ten. That especially includes warding, which is where Eve is an issue.


I'd also like to point out OP's ward score, http://wardscore.loltools.net/?name=Maya%20Fey&region=na (Can't fancy link on an iPad)
And SwapShadow's, http://wardscore.loltools.net/?name=SwapShadows&region=na

> As if anyone including yourself even wards properly. "Muh wards that I never place".

EDIT: Ward score just updated, it's actually 7% now.

How exactly does this work... I don't understand why it's only considering a total of 10 games for me... The numbers are also a lot lower than I expected for mine. E.g. if I go to my match history and look through my last 10 ranked games:
(role: wards + pinks, minutes of game)
ADC: 6 + 1, 22 (enemy team had an afk, no need for wards)
Top: 10+1, 34 (I could 1v2, no need for wards when I want to be ganked)
Mid: 16+2, 35
Mid: 9+1, 20
ADC: 13+2, 34
ADC: 9+1, 32
ADC: 10+1, 28
ADC: 13+1, 31
ADC: 9+1, 26
Supp: 20+2, 31

So first, it seems these are the 10 games in question (as my support avg is 20.0 wards per game, and it says I've never played a tank or assassin. Seems wrong that it doesn't include pink wards though. Also that it doesn't account for the length of the game (pretty hard to ward much when you barely get to level 9 to upgrade the trinket). 

Although it's a little eye opening, was pretty sure I warded more than this. I guess these 10 games may not be the best subset (I'd looked previously and seen better numbers) so I wonder how it selects its data. Still a useful tool though - maybe I just don't play enough to give it data.

Perma-stealth is in an entirely different arena. If you've got decent ward coverage, you will know where Rengar is before he ults, just like you'll know where Shaco is (also Shaco gives off a red puff of smoke, even in fog of war -- but still)... and Twitch is almost always in bot lane so an MIA and a ward in river helps out with that if he decides to roam.
